ghostPost.title: Startup Vancouver Interviews Boris Mann about Fission
ghostPost.excerpt: CEO & Co-founder of Fission, Boris Mann, is interviewed by Reza Varzidehkar as part of the Startup Vancouver Episode 44. Boris covers some of the vision and mission behind what Fission is building.
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: CEO & Co-founder of Fission, Boris Mann, is interviewed by Reza Varzidehkar as part of the Startup Vancouver Episode 44. Boris covers some of the vision and mission behind what Fission is building.

authors.name: Boris Mann
authors.bio: Hand-waving web tinkerer who cares about open source and the decentralized web. Cooks & eats.

authors.name: FISSION Team
authors.bio: Exploring fundamental shifts in the way we host, deploy, and run software for humans, using decentralized web technologies.

primary_author.name: Boris Mann
primary_author.bio: Hand-waving web tinkerer who cares about open source and the decentralized web. Cooks & eats.

ghostPost.plaintext:
I was invited to join Episode 44 of Startup Vancouver's #WhatKeepsYouUpAtNight
[https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/the-what-keeps-you-up-at-night-show-episode-044-tickets-140442079039] 
 show. I was interviewed by Reza Varzidehkar. The Q&A format was a really great
chance to talk about some of the vision and "why" behind what we're doing, as
well as explain some of the technical building blocks of how Fission works.

Here's the 17 minute clip of my interview:

Direct link to video vimeo.com/511387825 [https://vimeo.com/511387825]The
co-hosts of the show are Maryam Mobini
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/maryammobini/], Colin Weston
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/colin-weston-48bab63/]  and Reza Vee
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/rezavee/]. Thanks Reza for interviewing me, and
Colin for inviting me!

Other guests included  Melanie Ewan [https://www.linkedin.com/in/melanieewan/] 
of Volition Advisors [http://volitionadvisors.com/], and James Basnett
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/james-basnett/]  of Shape
[https://shapeimmersive.com/3d-ar/].

The full episode is available on YouTube
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PUMsDXyrueg]. The events are free to attend,
but donations are accepted on behalf of jack.org [https://jack.org/], "Canada's
only charity that trains and empowers young leaders to revolutionize mental
health in every province and territory".
ghostPost.html:
I was invited to join Episode 44 of Startup Vancouver's #WhatKeepsYouUpAtNight show. I was interviewed by Reza Varzidehkar. The Q&A format was a really great chance to talk about some of the vision and "why" behind what we're doing, as well as explain some of the technical building blocks of how Fission works.

Here's the 17 minute clip of my interview:

The co-hosts of the show are Maryam Mobini, Colin Weston and Reza Vee. Thanks Reza for interviewing me, and Colin for inviting me!

Other guests included Melanie Ewan of Volition Advisors, and James Basnett of Shape.

The full episode is available on YouTube. The events are free to attend, but donations are accepted on behalf of jack.org, "Canada's only charity that trains and empowers young leaders to revolutionize mental health in every province and territory".
